content: this pattern is a free pattern on my website https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-hexagon-tote-bag/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level intermediate this pattern uses the chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch changing colors magic_ring materials needed light weight yarn 4 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer all rights reserved copyright ©2021 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
